title: Povitica
description: Pronounced Pov-e-Tee-za, this Eastern European sweet bread is traditionally served at Christmas, but makes a delicious tea time treat at any time of the year. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a clean, flat single bed sheet and a 1kg/2lb loaf tin.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
½ vanilla pod, split and seeds scraped out
